Specifically designed for leaders and policymakers, the Doctor of Management Science Program at STIE Mahardhika Surabaya serves as a strategic platform to deepen strategic understanding, expand managerial insights, and cultivate visionary thinking. A space where knowledge and values merge into a force to <0>mold visionary leaders in the era of global complexity.</0>

competence.title: GRADUATE COMPETENCIES
competence.subtitle: This program shapes superior leaders and thinkers with strategic sharpness, principled leadership, and sustainable vision in four core areas of modern management:

items.title: HR Management & Transformational Leadership

items.title: Business Strategy & Global Competitiveness

items.title: Finance & Organizational Sustainability
items.description: Integrating performance, value, and social responsibility—so the organization not only grows but also sustains and is trusted.
